value.title: Facebook Said It’s Developing A Tool To Read Your Brain
value.excerpt: Facebook told employees on Tuesday that it’s developing a tool to summarize news articles so users won’t have to read them. It also laid out early plans for a neural sensor to detect people’s thoughts and translate them into action.

value.title: Light-powered, brain-like AI chips are in development

value.title: How China Is Using Facial Recognition Technology
value.excerpt: Facial recognition technology became part of the fabric of life in China in 2019. Enabled by a vast network of cameras across the country, the government is using the technology for surveillance.

value.title: Fun machine learning experiment creates a vocal opera in your browser
